sourceMeaningMnemonic: A <radical>building</radical> falls into the <radical>dirt</radical> when a <radical>pig</radical> with <radical>horns</radical> <kanji>crash</kanji>es into it. The building literally crashes to the ground when the horned pig attacks it.
meaningInfo: Picture a pig with horns crashing into a building and both of them crashing into the dirt. Uh oh, is the pig dead?
readingMnemonic: You pull the poor pig out of the rubble of the <kanji>crash</kanji>. It's not dead, but it had a nasty bump to the head and now thinks it's a bird. "<reading>TWEE</reading>T (<ja>つい</ja>)!" says the pig. "Tweet, tweet, tweet!" Poor confused pig.
readingInfo: Imagine trying to explain to the pig that it's a pig, and not a bird. "Tweet, tweet, tweet!" says the pig again. Oh dear.
